results.title: Lisinopril. A review of its pharmacology and clinical efficacy in elderly patients.
results.text_hl: Data from the GISSI-3 post-@DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarction@@@ trial show that @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ reduced mortality and @DISEASE_Ventricular_Dysfunction_Left @DISEASE_MESH:D018487 @@@left ventricular dysfunction@@@ when given for 42 days starting within 24 hours of the onset of @<m>DISEASE_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarction@@@ symptoms.

citations.NLM: Langtry HD, Markham A. Lisinopril. A review of its pharmacology and clinical efficacy in elderly patients. Drugs Aging. 1997 Feb;10(2):131-66. PMID: 9061270
citations.BibTeX: @article{9061270, title={Lisinopril. A review of its pharmacology and clinical efficacy in elderly patients.}, author={Langtry HD and Markham A}, journal={Drugs Aging}, volume={10}, number={2}, pages={131-66}}

results.title: Potential beneficial as well as detrimental effects of chronic treatment with lisinopril and (or) spironolactone on isolated hearts following low-flow ischemia in normal and infarcted rats.
results.text_hl: Potential beneficial as well as detrimental effects of chronic treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and (or) @CHEMICAL_Spironolactone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013148 @@@spironolactone@@@ on isolated hearts following low-flow @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@ in normal and @<m>DISEASE_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarcted@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

Potential beneficial as well as detrimental effects of chronic treatment with lisinopril and (or) spironolactone on isolated hearts following low-flow ischemia in normal and infarcted rats. results.title: Infarct size limiting effect of apstatin alone and in combination with enalapril, lisinopril and ramipril in rats with experimental myocardial infarction.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@Infarct size@@@ limiting effect of @CHEMICAL_apstatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C097277 @@@apstatin@@@ alone and in combination with @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Ramipril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017257 @@@ramipril@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with experimental @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarction@@@.

citations.NLM: Veeravalli KK, Akula A, Routhu KV, Kota MK. Infarct size limiting effect of apstatin alone and in combination with enalapril, lisinopril and ramipril in rats with experimental myocardial infarction. Pharmacol Res. 2003 Dec;48(6):557-63. PMID: 14527819

results.title: Protective effect of candesartan in experimental ischemic stroke in the rat mediated by AT2 and AT4 receptors.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Inhibition of production of endogenous angiotensins by pretreatment for 24 h with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ significantly increased mortality and @<m>DISEASE_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarct@@@ volume, whereas @CHEMICAL_candesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C081643 @@@candesartan@@@ for 24 h reduced blood pressure to the same extent but had no deleterious effect.

citations.NLM: Faure S, Bureau A, Oudart N, Javellaud J, Fournier A, Achard JM. Protective effect of candesartan in experimental ischemic stroke in the rat mediated by AT2 and AT4 receptors. J Hypertens. 2008 Oct;26(10):2008-15. PMID: 18806625
citations.BibTeX: @article{18806625, title={Protective effect of candesartan in experimental ischemic stroke in the rat mediated by AT2 and AT4 receptors.}, author={Faure S and Bureau A and Oudart N and Javellaud J and Fournier A and Achard JM}, journal={J Hypertens}, volume={26}, number={10}, pages={2008-15}}

results.title: Nitric oxide- and prostaglandin-mediated cardioprotection by bradykinin in myocardial ischemia and reperfusion injury.
results.text_hl: A lead II ECG was monitored at various intervals throughout the experiment. @<m>DISEASE_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@Infarct size@@@ expressed as percent of left ventricle was found to be 50.5 +/- 3.5 in control animals and was reduced to 19.4 +/- 1.1 and 15.0 +/- 2.1 with the combined treatment of @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Mercaptoethanol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008623 @@@2-mercaptoethanol@@@, respectively.

citations.NLM: Veeravalli KK, Akula A, Kota MK. Nitric oxide- and prostaglandin-mediated cardioprotection by bradykinin in myocardial ischemia and reperfusion injury. Pol J Pharmacol. 2003 Nov-Dec;55(6):1021-9. PMID: 14730097
citations.BibTeX: @article{14730097, title={Nitric oxide- and prostaglandin-mediated cardioprotection by bradykinin in myocardial ischemia and reperfusion injury.}, author={Veeravalli KK and Akula A and Kota MK}, journal={Pol J Pharmacol}, volume={55}, number={6}, pages={1021-9}}

results.title: [Converting enzyme inhibitors in acute myocardial infarct and heart failure].
results.text_hl: We introduced the therapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lopril@@@), in 70% of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ among 2855 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ that were admitted in Coronary Care Unit in 1997 and 1998.

citations.NLM: Arslanagić A, Raljević E. [Converting enzyme inhibitors in acute myocardial infarct and heart failure]. Med Arh. 1999;53(1):29-31. PMID: 10356928
citations.BibTeX: @article{10356928, title={[Converting enzyme inhibitors in acute myocardial infarct and heart failure].}, author={Arslanagić A and Raljević E}, journal={Med Arh}, volume={53}, number={1}, pages={29-31}}

results.title: Development and prevention of skeletal muscle structural alterations after experimental myocardial infarction.
results.text_hl: The present study was designed to assess whether structural alterations develop within skeletal muscle 1 yr after @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarction@@@ (MI) and failure and, if so, whether these structural alterations can be prevented by @GENE_ACE @GENE_24310 @@@angiotensin-converting enzyme@@@ (@GENE_ACE @GENE_24310 @@@ACE@@@) inhibition. @<m>DISEASE_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@Infarcted@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were randomized and treated for 1 yr with either placebo (MI-IP, n = 9), a low dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (MI-LL, 0.5 mg.kg-1.day-1, n = 12), or a high dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (MI-LH, 5 mg.kg-1.day-1, n = 9).

citations.NLM: Schieffer B, Wollert KC, Berchtold M, Saal K, Schieffer E, Hornig B, Riede UN, Drexler H. Development and prevention of skeletal muscle structural alterations after experimental myocardial infarction. Am J Physiol. 1995 Nov;269(5 Pt 2):H1507-13. PMID: 7503242
citations.BibTeX: @article{7503242, title={Development and prevention of skeletal muscle structural alterations after experimental myocardial infarction.}, author={Schieffer B and Wollert KC and Berchtold M and Saal K and Schieffer E and Hornig B and Riede UN and Drexler H}, journal={Am J Physiol}, volume={269}, number={5 Pt 2}, pages={H1507-13}}

results.title: Survival after myocardial infarction in the rat. Role of tissue angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibition.
results.text_hl: METHODS AND RESULTS: @<m>DISEASE_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@Infarcted@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were randomized to placebo, low-dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, or high-dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (each, n = 80) and compared with sham-operated animals (n = 40).

citations.NLM: Wollert KC, Studer R, von Bülow B, Drexler H. Survival after myocardial infarction in the rat. Role of tissue angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibition. Circulation. 1994 Nov;90(5):2457-67. PMID: 7955203
citations.BibTeX: @article{7955203, title={Survival after myocardial infarction in the rat. Role of tissue angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibition.}, author={Wollert KC and Studer R and von Bülow B and Drexler H}, journal={Circulation}, volume={90}, number={5}, pages={2457-67}}

results.title: Involvement of nitric oxide and prostaglandin pathways in the cardioprotective actions of bradykinin in rats with experimental myocardial infarction.
results.text_hl: A lead II electrocardiogram was monitored at various intervals throughout the experiment. @<m>DISEASE_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@Infarct@@@ size reduction obtained with the combined inhibition of @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_apstatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C097277 @@@apstatin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_apstatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C097277 @@@apstatin@@@ was blocked partially but significantly with the prior administration of @CHEMICAL_NG_Nitroarginine_Methyl_Ester @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019331 @@@L-NAME@@@ (@CHEMICAL_NG_Nitroarginine_Methyl_Ester @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019331 @@@Nomega-nitro-L-arginine methyl ester@@@) or @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@, suggesting the involvement of both @CHEMICAL_Nitric_Oxide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009569 @@@nitric oxide@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Prostaglandins @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011453 @@@prostaglandin@@@ pathways in the cardioprotective actions mediated by bradykinin.

citations.NLM: Veeravalli KK, Akula A. Involvement of nitric oxide and prostaglandin pathways in the cardioprotective actions of bradykinin in rats with experimental myocardial infarction. Pharmacol Res. 2004 Jan;49(1):23-9. PMID: 14597148
citations.BibTeX: @article{14597148, title={Involvement of nitric oxide and prostaglandin pathways in the cardioprotective actions of bradykinin in rats with experimental myocardial infarction.}, author={Veeravalli KK and Akula A}, journal={Pharmacol Res}, volume={49}, number={1}, pages={23-9}}

results.title: Differential effects of kinins on cardiomyocyte hypertrophy and interstitial collagen matrix in the surviving myocardium after myocardial infarction in the rat.
results.text_hl: Additional groups of @<m>DISEASE_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarcted@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were treated with the ACE inhibitor @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ or the AT1 receptor antagonist @CHEMICAL_ZD_7155 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C095905 @@@ZD7155@@@, each separately and in combination with icatibant.

citations.NLM: Wollert KC, Studer R, Doerfer K, Schieffer E, Holubarsch C, Just H, Drexler H.
